and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H430>aren't<s%> you God in <S%H8064>heaven?<s%> <S%H4910>Aren't<s%> you ruler over all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations?<s%> <S%H3581>Power<s%> and <S%H1369>might<s%> are in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> so that no one is able to withstand <S%H3320>you.<s%>

<S%H430>Didn't<s%> you, our God, drive <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of this <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> it to the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> your <S%H157>friend<s%> <S%H5769>forever?<s%>
They <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H1129>it,<s%> and have built you a <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> in it for your <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H7451><s%> 'If evil <S%H935>comes<s%> on <S%H2719>us<s%>—the sword, <S%H8196>judgment,<s%> <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> or <S%H7458>famine<s%>—we will <S%H5975>stand<s%> before this <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6440>you,<s%> (for your <S%H8034>name<s%> is in this <S%H1004>house<s%>), and <S%H2199>cry<s%> to you in our <S%H6869>affliction,<s%> and you will <S%H8085>hear<s%> and <S%H3467>save.<s%>'

<S%H1121>Now,<s%> behold, the children of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> and <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> whom you would not <S%H5414>let<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>invade,<s%> when they came <S%H935>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> but they <S%H5493>turned<s%> aside from <S%H8045>them,<s%> and didn't destroy them;
<S%H1580>behold,<s%> how they reward <S%H935>us,<s%> to come to cast us <S%H1644>out<s%> of your <S%H3425>possession,<s%> which you have given us to <S%H3423>inherit.<s%>

Our <S%H430>God,<s%> will you not <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H3581>them?<s%> For we have no might <S%H6440>against<s%> this <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1995>company<s%> that <S%H935>comes<s%> against <S%H3045>us;<s%> neither know <S%H587>we<s%> what to <S%H6213>do,<s%> but our eyes are on <S%H5869>you.<s%>"

and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7181>"Listen,<s%> all <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and you <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and you <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat.<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H3372>you,<s%> 'Don't be afraid, neither be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of this <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1995>multitude;<s%> for the <S%H4421>battle<s%> is not <S%H430>yours,<s%> but God's.

<S%H4279>Tomorrow<s%> go <S%H3381>down<s%> against <S%H5927>them.<s%> Behold, they are coming up by the <S%H5927>ascent<s%> of <S%H6732>Ziz.<s%> You shall <S%H4672>find<s%> them at the <S%H5490>end<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H3385>Jeruel.<s%>

You will not need to <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H3320>battle.<s%> Set <S%H5975>yourselves,<s%> stand <S%H7200>still,<s%> and see the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with <S%H3063>you,<s%> O Judah and <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> <S%H3372>Don't<s%> be afraid, nor be <S%H2865>dismayed.<s%> Go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H6440>against<s%> them <S%H4279>tomorrow,<s%> for Yahweh is with <S%H3068>you.<s%>'"

<S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H6915>bowed<s%> his head with his <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground;<s%> and all <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> down <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H7812>worshipping<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H6256>When<s%> they <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H7440>sing<s%> and to <S%H8416>praise,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H693>ambushers<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> who had <S%H935>come<s%> against <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and they were <S%H5062>struck.<s%>
